/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. 

Trees line the street, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Streetlights stand sentinel at regular intervals, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. Cars can be seen in the distance, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. 

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
